name: M∀LICE QUEEN WHITE BINDER
desc:
2+ monsters, including a "M∀LICE" monster
If this card is Special Summoned: You can target up to 3 cards in any GY(s); banish them. During your Main Phase: You can Set 1 "M∀LICE" Trap from your Deck or GY. If this card is banished: You can pay 900 LP; Special Summon this card, then you can draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "M∀LICE  WHITE BINDER" once per turn.
